com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb

Class AbstractMBList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.currencycloud.coolpay.mb.AbstractMBList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Entity
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaymentMBList, RecipientMBList

    public abstract class AbstractMBList<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is the abstract class base to provide common behaviour for all the list user interfaces for the entities, if necessary.
    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tranquilo Dognini Neto
    See Also:
    RecipientMBList, Serialized Form

      java.util.List<T> getList()

      abstract void retrieveAll()

        @Produces
public java.util.List<T> getList()

      • onListChanged

        public void onListChanged(@Observes(notifyObserver=IF_EXISTS)
                          T e)
        This is an observer method. It will be invoked always when the the user save a new entity.
        Parameters:
        e - is the object T created.
